nodes.title: Uncertainty Mechanics Tree
nodes.excerpt: Classical, statistical, and quantum-stochastic uncertainty mapped to physics constraints.
nodes.bodyMD:
This tree maps how uncertainty is defined, propagated, and bounded across classical, statistical, and quantum-stochastic workflows.

Minimal artifact: uncertainty map with propagation and constraint notes.
nodes.summary: Classical, statistical, and quantum-stochastic uncertainty mapped to physics constraints.

nodes.title: Classical Uncertainty Stack
nodes.excerpt: Model error, boundary conditions, and numerical precision limits.
nodes.bodyMD:
Classical uncertainty is driven by model assumptions, boundary conditions, discretization, and precision limits.

Minimal artifact: error budget and boundary-condition justification.
nodes.summary: Model error, boundary conditions, and numerical precision limits.

nodes.title: Boundary Conditions
nodes.excerpt: Boundary choices define admissible modes and error bands.
nodes.bodyMD:
Boundary condition choices set mode structure and error profiles (docs/knowledge/physics/boundary-conditions-modes.md).

Minimal artifact: boundary condition choice log.
nodes.summary: Boundary choices define admissible modes and error bands.

nodes.title: Discretization and Mesh
nodes.excerpt: Mesh resolution and discretization error control uncertainty.
nodes.bodyMD:
Discretization and mesh resolution set numerical error bands (docs/knowledge/physics/discretization-mesh.md).

Minimal artifact: mesh resolution plan.
nodes.summary: Mesh resolution and discretization error control uncertainty.

nodes.title: Numerical Precision
nodes.excerpt: Floating point precision limits error floors.
nodes.bodyMD:
Precision budgets constrain achievable error floors (docs/knowledge/physics/numerical-precision.md).

Minimal artifact: precision budget note.
nodes.summary: Floating point precision limits error floors.

nodes.title: Stability and Timestep
nodes.excerpt: Stability bounds constrain timestep error growth.
nodes.bodyMD:
Timestep stability bounds limit error accumulation (docs/knowledge/physics/stability-timestep.md).

Minimal artifact: stability bound summary.
nodes.summary: Stability bounds constrain timestep error growth.

nodes.title: Statistical Uncertainty Stack
nodes.excerpt: Sampling noise, distributions, and stochastic variance.
nodes.bodyMD:
Statistical uncertainty captures sampling variance and Monte Carlo spreads.

Minimal artifact: sampling distribution with propagated bands.
nodes.summary: Sampling noise, distributions, and stochastic variance.

nodes.title: Sampling Time Bounds
nodes.excerpt: Sampling windows bound valid averages.
nodes.bodyMD:
Sampling windows must respect system timescales (docs/knowledge/physics/sampling-time-bounds.md).

Minimal artifact: sampling window justification.
nodes.summary: Sampling windows bound valid averages.

nodes.title: Monte Carlo Bands
nodes.excerpt: Monte Carlo spreads define statistical error bands.
nodes.bodyMD:
Monte Carlo bands show distribution spread (server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: Monte Carlo band output.
nodes.summary: Monte Carlo spreads define statistical error bands.

nodes.title: Propagated Bands
nodes.excerpt: Uncertainty propagation across geometry and energy bands.
nodes.bodyMD:
Uncertainty propagation flows through geometry and energy bands (server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: propagated band summary.
nodes.summary: Uncertainty propagation across geometry and energy bands.

nodes.title: Uncertainty Data Contracts
nodes.excerpt: Shared schemas for values, sigmas, and bands.
nodes.bodyMD:
Shared uncertainty fields define value, sigma, and band contracts (shared/physics.ts, shared/schema.ts, server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: schema field list.
nodes.summary: Shared schemas for values, sigmas, and bands.

nodes.title: 1-Sigma Containers
nodes.excerpt: Explicit 1-sigma value containers.
nodes.bodyMD:
Uncertainty containers encode 1-sigma values (shared/physics.ts).

Minimal artifact: Uncertainty1D / Vec3Uncertainty fields.
nodes.summary: Explicit 1-sigma value containers.

nodes.title: Band Fields
nodes.excerpt: Min/max bands for propagated ranges.
nodes.bodyMD:
Band fields encode min/max ranges for propagated uncertainty (shared/schema.ts, server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: band field examples.
nodes.summary: Min/max bands for propagated ranges.

nodes.title: Quantum-Stochastic Bridge
nodes.excerpt: Noise-kernel constraints for semiclassical sourcing.
nodes.bodyMD:
Quantum-stochastic uncertainty uses renormalized stress-energy with noise models and coherence windows (docs/quantum-gr-bridge.md).

Minimal artifact: stochastic source contract and tau/r_c bounds.
nodes.summary: Noise-kernel constraints for semiclassical sourcing.

nodes.title: Quantum-GR Bridge
nodes.excerpt: Semiclassical interface with uncertainty propagation.
nodes.bodyMD:
Bridge contract for <T_mu_nu>_ren and uncertainty propagation (docs/quantum-gr-bridge.md).

Minimal artifact: bridge contract summary.
nodes.summary: Semiclassical interface with uncertainty propagation.

nodes.title: Coherence Window
nodes.excerpt: Tau and r_c set the causal sampling window.
nodes.bodyMD:
Coherence windows define causal sampling and stochastic limits (docs/quantum-gr-bridge.md, docs/DP_COLLAPSE_DERIVATION.md, shared/dp-collapse.ts).

Minimal artifact: tau/r_c bound note.
nodes.summary: Tau and r_c set the causal sampling window.

nodes.title: Approximation Ladders
nodes.excerpt: Approximation ladders bridge classical and statistical models.
nodes.bodyMD:
Approximation ladders bridge classical estimates and statistical bands for transient energy models.

Minimal artifact: approximation ladder and band justification.
nodes.summary: Approximation ladders bridge classical and statistical models.

nodes.title: Axisymmetric Approximations
nodes.excerpt: Closed-form approximations and Monte Carlo deltas.
nodes.bodyMD:
Axisymmetric surface-area approximations and Monte Carlo deltas define bands (server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: approximation delta report.
nodes.summary: Closed-form approximations and Monte Carlo deltas.

nodes.title: PFA and Geometry Approximations
nodes.excerpt: PFA and geometry approximations for Casimir models.
nodes.bodyMD:
Casimir geometry approximations (PFA, spherical caps) define model spread (modules/sim_core/static-casimir.ts).

Minimal artifact: PFA approximation note.
nodes.summary: PFA and geometry approximations for Casimir models.

nodes.title: Casimir Model Bands
nodes.excerpt: Material models define banded ranges.
nodes.bodyMD:
Material model bands (ideal/Drude/plasma/Hamaker) set energy spreads (docs/casimir-tile-mechanism.md, server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: model band summary.
nodes.summary: Material models define banded ranges.

nodes.title: Dynamic Casimir Transients
nodes.excerpt: Transient energy approximations for time-varying boundaries.
nodes.bodyMD:
Dynamic Casimir simulations add transient approximation layers (modules/dynamic/dynamic-casimir.ts).

Minimal artifact: transient approximation summary.
nodes.summary: Transient energy approximations for time-varying boundaries.

nodes.title: Collapse Constraints
nodes.excerpt: Causal collapse benchmarks and policy gating.
nodes.bodyMD:
Collapse benchmarks define causal tau/r_c limits and policy gates (docs/collapse-benchmark-backend-roadmap.md, shared/collapse-benchmark.ts, modules/policies/coherence-governor.ts).

Minimal artifact: collapse benchmark run and causal footprint report.
nodes.summary: Causal collapse benchmarks and policy gating.

nodes.title: Collapse Benchmark
nodes.excerpt: Benchmark contract for causal collapse estimates.
nodes.bodyMD:
Collapse benchmark contracts define tau/r_c and hazard rates (docs/collapse-benchmark-backend-roadmap.md, shared/collapse-benchmark.ts).

Minimal artifact: benchmark input/output payload.
nodes.summary: Benchmark contract for causal collapse estimates.

nodes.title: Coherence Governor
nodes.excerpt: Policy gating tied to collapse confidence.
nodes.bodyMD:
Coherence governor ties collapse pressure to policy actions (modules/policies/coherence-governor.ts).

Minimal artifact: coherence decision summary.
nodes.summary: Policy gating tied to collapse confidence.

Reality constraints bound uncertainty handling through energy conditions and QI limits.
